content:
Announcements

Date Announcement
5/2

As you know, we have been a tad behind in lecture, according to the published schedule. To "catch up," I've combined a couple of the remaining lectures. I have also moved the hardware, data comm and sharing information lecture topics to earlier lectures, so I can be sure to cover that material well before the due dates of labs where it will be useful. See the Course Schedule web page for the changes.
